TopicTitle: .... make fps show in the game

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I see many people referring to their fps in the game. Which button toggles that?

W

In videos, most people tend to use fraps which has a built in frames per second indicator so that may be why they can refer to it. However, to my knowledge, no shortcut is available to show ingame fps.
I use EVGA Precision. Some use FRAPS, but that's more for video capture than for benchmarks and such.

Ah ok I see, I thought it was a part of the game that there was some mystic button to press LOL. I will have a look into it.

regards,

W
